Major_Arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Initial Encounters and the Ghost Town Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Nan and Cal, their complex relationship, and the looming threat to the Ghost Town, setting the stage for personal and external conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Lament and Skeptical Rebuttal
sub_scenes.description: Nan expresses her disillusionment and dreams in a saloon, met with skepticism.

sub_scenes.title: Abrupt Departure and Ghost Town's Fate
sub_scenes.description: Nan leaves abruptly, and new characters discuss plans to demolish the Ghost Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Ghost Town and Development Plans

sub_scenes.title: Intimacy and Misjudgment
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal engage in a deeper conversation about their feelings and the ghost town's demolition.

Major_Arcs.title: Father-Daughter Conflict and Nan's Emotional Journey
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the strained relationship between Nan and her father, her emotional turmoil, and her pursuit of understanding with Cal.

sub_scenes.title: Business and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Nan interrupts her father's business to discuss horses, leading to rejection and conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Mother's Wisdom and Nan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Nan seeks comfort from her mother and decides to confront Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Seek Clarity from Cal

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Conflict and Reunion with Cal
sub_scenes.description: Nan confronts Cal, leading to separation and eventual emotional reunion.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Loneliness and Reflection on Cal's Absence

Major_Arcs.title: Severe Weather and Cattle Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to a weather crisis threatening the cattle and the community.

sub_scenes.title: Weather Concerns and Dire Predictions
sub_scenes.description: Characters discuss the worsening weather and its potential impact.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Mr. Wills' and Weather Report
Historical Context of Severe Snow and Impending Starvation
Cal's Resolve to Save the Cattle

sub_scenes.title: Despair and Hope Amidst Snowfall
sub_scenes.description: The community faces despair, but a glimmer of hope arrives with aerial assistance.

narrative_arcs.title: Sound of a Plane and Hopeful Discovery
Fodder from the Plane and Seeds of Romance

Major_Arcs.title: Chane Benson's Conflict and Newspaper Drama
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson and focuses on conflict, newspaper publishing, and complex relationships.

sub_scenes.title: Street Showdown and Town Gossip
sub_scenes.description: Chane Benson's violent act in town sparks varied reactions and gossip.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Reactions

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Hero Worship and Sally's Concerns
sub_scenes.description: Sally reflects on Jeff's fascination with violence and her worry about his behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Reflection on Jeff's Youth and Clyde's Commentary
Jeff's Defensive Outburst and Clyde Insult

sub_scenes.title: Sally and Clyde's Worries and Past
sub_scenes.description: Sally expresses her fears about Jeff to Clyde, recalling troubling past incidents.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally and Clyde's Worries About Jeff's Behavior
Sally's Flashback of Jeff's Troubling Past
Introduction to Mr. Benson and Ominous Advice

sub_scenes.title: Article Controversy and Benson's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Clyde's article causes uproar and concern for his safety, leading to Benson's calculated response.

sub_scenes.title: Deceptive Dinner and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: A dinner invitation leads to deception, confrontation, and violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Threat and Assertion of Dominance
Sally's Rage, Chane's Departure, and Warning about Clyde
Jeff's Determined Pursuit to Save Clyde
Confrontation and Er's Plea for Restraint
Jeff's Explanation to Sis about Clyde
Sally and Clyde's Conversation about Headline Change
Office Discussion: Newspaper Edition and Lessons Learned

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy and Steve's Range War Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the developing relationship between Betsy and Steve amidst a brewing range war.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Conflict and Introduction
sub_scenes.description: A whip fight occurs alongside the introduction of Steve Daley and Betsy's initial interactions.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Betsy's Job and Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Skepticism, Warnings, and Polite Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve's interactions are marked by sarcasm, warnings of range war, and Betsy's independence.

narrative_arcs.title: Offer of a Ride and Polite Refusal

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Range War and Betsy's Decision
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation with Fred Bridges escalates the range war, leading Betsy to make a crucial decision about Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Fred Bridges and Fight
Betsy's Realization and Decision about Steve Daley
Betsy's Change of Heart Regarding Firing Steve
Hank's Gratitude and Betsy's Suggestion for Personal Thanks

sub_scenes.title: Love and a Gunfighter's Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve confront the core conflict of their relationship: Steve's gunfighter identity.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Conflicted Feelings about Steve's Gunslinger Identity
Declaration of Love and the Dilemma of Steve's Identity
Steve's Stance and Betsy's Plea for Love
Betsy's Unconditional Love and Steve's Wavering Resolve

Major_Arcs.title: Range War Climax and Romantic Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the climax of the range war and the romantic resolution for Betsy and Steve.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Conflict and Betsy's Defiance
sub_scenes.description: Trouble brews, and Betsy confronts those she believes are encroaching on her land.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Past Conflict and Gunfighter Identity

sub_scenes.title: Resolution at Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: The conflict moves towards Devil's Pass, culminating in a dramatic rescue and romantic conclusion.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Justification and Steve's Reluctant Agreement
The Silent Journey and Cessation of Gunfire
Arrival at Devil's Pass and Accusation

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie, Dave, and Fred - Romantic Entanglements and Business Schemes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Carrie's complicated relationships and business dealings, marked by love, betrayal, and strategic maneuvering.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Life and Range Dispute
sub_scenes.description: Ranch life is disrupted by personal arguments and the arrival of range trouble.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Budding Romance
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of the range dispute leads to apologies and a budding romance between Carrie and Dave.

narrative_arcs.title: Apologies and Reassurance After the Confrontation
Dave's Support and Carrie's Confession of Love
Reflections on Past Misunderstandings and a Romantic Proposal

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Business Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Fred's true motives are revealed, leading to Carrie's betrayal and a business confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Fred's Strategic Proposition and Carrie's Initial Reaction
The Unveiling of Fred's Selfish Motives and Carrie's Betrayal
Carrie's Angry Confrontation and Rejection of Fred
The Confrontation with Fred and Dave's Unexpected Arrival
Carlton's Account of Fred's Visit and Carrie's Rejection
Dave's Interrogation and Carrie's Love Confession
Dave's Pragmatic Advice and Carrie's Emotional Turmoil
Dave's Persuasion and Carrie's Plea for Affection

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Rance - Love, Duty, and Escape Climax
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc culminates in Dirk and Rance's escape, facing pursuit, moral dilemmas, and their intertwined destinies.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Realization
sub_scenes.description: Dirk and Chris realize they are being pursued, leading to a flashback and confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Questioning at the Ranch
Shift in Stance and Temporary Truce
Evolving Relationship - Night Encounter and Recognition
Retrospective on Evasion Attempts and the Marshal's Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Recovery and Wedding Day
sub_scenes.description: Rance is found unconscious and recovers, leading to a wedding day filled with mixed emotions.
